effect.x_y: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.

short_effect.x_y: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.

flavor_text.x_y: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.
